price: 28. Kuuma aanu soo dirinna (Nabi Muxammadow) waxaan aheyn dadka oo dhan bishaareeye iyo dige ahaan, dadku se badankoodu ma oga.
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ إِلَّا كَآفَّةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnāka illā kāffatan lilnnāsi bashīran wanadhīran walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
